system.description:
Your attempt to mend the witch/warlock schism has granted you greater insight into all branches of magical practice.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain one of each of the following: an elective study, an arcane innovation, a divine lesson, a secret of nature, and a sign of faith.  The Witch's Studies, Innovative Witchery, Witch's Faith, Witch's Lessons, and Natural Witchery magical mysteries may now be taken multiple times and without level requirements.
